scenes.description: 'So, what do you suggest we do then?'

options.text: Maybe we should take a vote to see what the majority prefers.
options.analysis: You proposed a democratic approach, showing good self-regulation and social skills, but perception, empathy, and motivation were moderate.

options.text: I think a compromise might be the best route. How about a mix of activities?
options.analysis: You suggested a balanced solution, showing good perception and empathy, but social skill, self-regulation, and motivation were moderate.

options.text: Honestly, this is becoming too complicated. Maybe we should just cancel the celebration.
options.analysis: You expressed frustration and proposed canceling, showing high motivation to resolve the issue but lower empathy and social skills.
